title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: When performing the 'copy package' operation in project Ae, the behavior is unexpected and strange. The issue occurs in the org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui module of jdt.ui3. When selecting a package as the source and choosing the 'copy' option from the context menu, the behavior is not as expected.
OB: The 'copy package' operation in project Ae does not perform as expected when selecting a package and choosing the 'copy' option from the context menu.
EB: The 'copy package' operation in project Ae should create a copy of the selected package in the same project with the same content.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new project named xxx. 
2. Open the package viewer in project Ae. 
3. Select a package in the viewer. 
4. From the context menu, choose the 'copy' option.
